description: A lightweight AI client module for generating Statement of Work (SOW) content from a prompt. It communicates with a local backend API at /api/ai/sow to generate SOW drafts based on user input.

methods.name: generateSOWFromPrompt(promptText)
methods.description: Asynchronously generates a SOW draft from a given prompt string by POSTing to the local backend API and handling the response.

parameters.name: promptText
parameters.description: The user input prompt used to generate the SOW draft.

methods.returns: A promise resolving to an object with 'ok' status and either 'content' or 'error'.
